column2: Bug: "Page_Begin", "Page_Middle" and "Page_End" sections are picked on lines 10, 11 and 12 regardless what is there. So it is better to leave them there.
Bug: \r\n is not turned into a newline on "Page" entries.
Bug: "Image" sections are not active, but should.

<html><head><title>Media Info</title><style type="text/css">html,body,table{font-size:x-small} html,body{margin:0} html,body{padding:0} table{empty-cells:show} td.Name{white-space:pre-wrap} td.RowIndent{empty-cells:hide} td.RowIndent{background-color:white} td.RowIndent{border:hidden} td.RowHead{font-weight:bold}</style></head><body><table class="body" width="100%" border="1" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="0" style="border:0px"><caption></caption><col span="2" width="6"><col span="3"><col span="4" align="right" style="white-space:nowrap"><thead><tr align="center" style="white-space:normal"><th colspan="3">Kind</th><th>Format</th><th>Lng</th><th align="center">Def.</th><th align="center">Bits</th><th align="center">Freq.</th><th align="center">Bitrate</th></tr></thead>

)($if(%FileSize%,%FileSize/String2%,size ?)$if(%Duration%, ~ %Duration/String%))$if(%BitRate%,%BitRate/String%,
